duties_responsibilities.duty: Grow a book of business by selling professional and/or commercial lines products to prospects and providing best-in-class service to existing clients.
Assess client needs and coverage recommendations, negotiate with insurance company underwriters, and deliver coverage options.
Meet service standards, review policies, engage in client renewal, and provide best renewal options.
Maintain strong working knowledge of the healthcare delivery system and market conditions.
Participate in training and educational seminars, mentor and train account managers as needed.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in business, insurance, or related field (Master's preferred)
P&C insurance license required or ability to obtain in first 60 days in position
